pageContext.claim: “He [Biden] even described law enforcement as the enemy. He said law enforcement is the enemy.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is taking Biden out of context. This is Biden's full quote, in a July 8 interview with activist Ady Barkan: "Surplus military equipment for law enforcement: they don't need that. The last thing you need is an up-armored Humvee coming into a neighborhood; it’s like the military invading. They don't know anybody; they become the enemy. They're supposed to be protecting these people."
